T02D3631:248a-1: ya m'anta ka s'a dha nam /
T02D3631:248a-3: gshin rje mthar byed kyi sgrub thabs /
T02D3631:248a-4: gshin rje mthar byed la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3631:248a-5: dpa' bo thod pa'i phreng ba can //
T02D3631:248a-6: klu sogs rgyan gyis gsal mdzad pa //
T02D3631:248a-7: gshin rje gshed mgon phyag 'tshal nas //
T02D3631:248a-8: de yi sgrub thabs bri bar bya //
T02D3631:248a-9: bde ba'i stan la yang dag 'dug //
T02D3631:248b-0: @248b snying gar h'um yig mthing nag dgod //
T02D3631:248b-1: de skyes mchod pa'i khyad par gyis //
T02D3631:248b-2: khyab bdag mchog tu rab mchod bya //
T02D3631:248b-3: de yi mdun du phyogs byas te //
T02D3631:248b-4: sdig pa bshags pa la sogs bya //
T02D3631:248b-5: 'gro kun rang bzhin med par ni //
T02D3631:248b-6: skad cig gis ni thams cad blta //
T02D3631:248b-7: snying ga'i sa bon rtags las byung //
T02D3631:248b-8: zhabs kyi chu skyes g-yon brkyang ba //
T02D3631:248b-9: khro gnyer bsdus shing zhal 'jigs la //
T02D3631:248b-10: sma ra dmar ser sngon ma bzhin //
T02D3631:248b-11: zhal gsum ljags ni bskyod pa yi //
T02D3631:248b-12: 'jigs byed mche ba gtsigs pa can //
T02D3631:248b-13: spyan ni dmar zhing gsus chen la //
T02D3631:248b-14: sprin nag sar pa'i 'od zer can //
T02D3631:248b-15: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas shing //
T02D3631:248b-16: ma he yi ni mtshan la bzhugs //
T02D3631:248b-17: mi'u thung stag gi sham thabs can //
T02D3631:248b-18: khengs pa thams cad 'joms mdzad pa //
T02D3631:248b-19: nyi ma'i 'od zer gzi mdangs can //
T02D3631:248b-20: ma lus phyogs rnams 'gengs byed pa //
T02D3631:248b-22: bskal pa tha ma'i me dang mtshungs //
T02D3631:248b-24: ro langs dgra sta zhags pa bsnams //
T02D3631:248b-25: phyag drug rnams na mdzes pa ste //
T02D3631:248b-26: g-yas dang g-yon pa'i phyag rnams su //
T02D3631:248b-27: khro bcas 'jigs byed shin tu drag / gshin rje mthar byed bdud 'dul ba //
T02D3631:248b-28: h'um yig gis gang mgrin par bsgom //
T02D3631:248b-29: skrag pa rnams ni rnam par spang //
T02D3631:248b-30: nyi shu phyed kyi stong phrag gis //
T02D3631:248b-31: sngags rnams sngags ni rtag tu rig //
T02D3631:248b-32: sems ni gzengs bstod bzlas par bya //
T02D3631:248b-34: sngon du bsnyen pa'i cho ga yis //
T02D3631:248b-36: las kyi rjes 'brang kha dog rnams //
T02D3631:248b-37: mangs pas bdag gis ma bshad do //
T02D3631:248b-38: bla ma'i man ngag bsams nas ni //
T02D3631:248b-39: de las 'dod pa'i dngos grub bo //
T02D3631:248b-40: 'bad pa yis ni shes byas la //
T02D3631:248b-41: dpa' bo rnams kyi bsnyen pa'ang bya //
T02D3631:248b-42: gtor ma nyer spyod rnal 'byor gyis //
T02D3631:248b-43: thun mtshams bzhi ru bsgrub par bya //
T02D3631:248b-45: aom hr'i:shtr'i:bi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
